duties_responsibilities.duty: Build year-round client relationships and provide tax preparation, tax audit support, and tax planning year-round.
Conduct tax interviews face to face and through virtual tools (video conferencing, phone, chat, email) to create confidence in clients.
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services.
Grow tax expertise and work in a fast-paced, supportive environment.
Complete 18-hour continuing education requirement and meet all IRS and applicable state requirements.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (CPA or Enrolled Agent certification preferred)
